definitions.definition: A dark and gloomy part of the realm of Hades , reserved for the damned and the wicked, such as the Titans ; an equivalent of hell in Greek and Roman mythology.
Any hellish place; a dark gloomy chasm or pit.

main_definition: ( Greek mythology , Roman mythology ) A dark and gloomy part of the realm of Hades , reserved for the damned and the wicked, such as the Titans ; an equivalent of hell in Greek and Roman mythology.
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Any hellish place; a dark gloomy chasm or pit.
